about_the_game:
DECK BUILDER AUTO BATTLER HYBRID

Choose between 50+ monsters across 10 different factions to create a deck that is able to handle anything the heroes will throw at you.

DEFEND YOUR DUNGEON

Tactically position your units to defend against waves of marauding heroes. As you clear out the floors of the dungeon, you will encounter progressively stronger enemies. Do you have what it takes to stop the crawl?

SYNERGIZE

The key to unlocking your monsters’ potential is knowing how to utilize their faction traits. These traits have significant effects that will change the tide of battle. Figure out which factions work well together to create a board that can beat back the heroes.

ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM

You’ll encounter new and more powerful heroes as you progress through your dungeons' many floors. Each floor will introduce a new challenge requiring you to rebuild and rethink your defenses using the monsters in your deck.

short_description: Stop the Crawl is a roguelike deckbuilding autobattler. Craft your deck of monsters to fight against the invading heroes! Mix and match monsters, utilizing the different synergies between them, to make the perfect team composition.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
